unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Library Survey on Child Height and Shoe Size
question_text: Suppose a random sample of size $n = 40\text{ children}$ were taken at a local library, where they were asked their shoe size and age. What $r$ value and test statistic would be most likely to occur when performing a linear regression $T$ -test of $H_0: B = 0$ vs. $H_a: B \gt 0$ ?
